name: Super High Protein Brownies (Radioactive Brownies)
ingredients: ¾ cup chocolate whey protein powder
2–3 tbsp zero-calorie sweetener (allulose, erythritol, or monk fruit)
½ cup + 1 tbsp liquid egg whites
½ cup low-fat or fat-free cottage cheese
Optional: sugar-free chocolate chips for topping
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F and line an 8×8-inch pan with parchment paper
Whisk all dry ingredients in a bowl until smooth
Blend all wet ingredients together for exactly 10 seconds
Pour wet into dry and fold until thick batter forms – don't overmix
Bake 12–15 minutes (12 = super fudgy, 15 = firmer edges)
Cool completely in the fridge, then cut into 9 large brownies
